_Builder.WriteString (METH)
_Builder.WriteString (METH)
Â¶
METHOD FINAL WriteString : UDINT
Appends the contents of
sValue
to the buffer.
It returns the number of bytes written.
InOut:

Type
Initial
Comment
Return
WriteString
